SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: UPDRS - Activities of Daily Living: Cutting Food and Handling Utensils

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Unified Parkinson's Disease Rating Scale - Activities of daily living (for both 'on' and 'off'): Dressing.
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: UPDRS - Activities of Daily Living: Dressing

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Unified Parkinson's Disease Rating Scale - Activities of daily living (for both 'on' and 'off'): Falling (unrelated to freezing).
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: UPDRS - Activities of Daily Living: Falling

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Unified Parkinson's Disease Rating Scale - Activities of daily living (for both 'on' and 'off'): Freezing when walking.
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: UPDRS - Activities of Daily Living: Freezing When Walking

SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: UPDRS - Activities of Daily Living: Handwriting

SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: UPDRS - Activities of Daily Living: Hygiene

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Unified Parkinson's Disease Rating Scale - Activities of daily living (for both 'on' and 'off'): Salivation.
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: UPDRS - Activities of Daily Living: Salivation

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Unified Parkinson's Disease Rating Scale - Activities of daily living (for both 'on' and 'off'): Sensory complaints related to Parkinsonism.
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: UPDRS - Activities of Daily Living: Sensory Complaints Related to Parkinsonism

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Unified Parkinson's Disease Rating Scale - Activities of daily living (for both 'on' and 'off'): Speech.
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: UPDRS - Activities of Daily Living: Speech

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Unified Parkinson's Disease Rating Scale - Activities of daily living (for both 'on' and 'off'): Swallowing.
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: UPDRS - Activities of Daily Living: Swallowing

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Unified Parkinson's Disease Rating Scale - Activities of daily living (for both 'on' and 'off'): Tremor (Symptomatic complaint of tremor in any part of body.).
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: UPDRS - Activities of Daily Living: Tremor

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Unified Parkinson's Disease Rating Scale - Activities of daily living (for both 'on' and 'off'): Turning in bed and adjusting bed clothes.
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: UPDRS - Activities of Daily Living: Turning in Bed and Adjusting Bed Clothes

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Unified Parkinson's Disease Rating Scale - Activities of daily living (for both 'on' and 'off'): Walking.
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: UPDRS - Activities of Daily Living: Walking

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Unified Parkinson's Disease Rating Scale - Blood pressure: Seated.
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: UPDRS - Symptomatic Orthostasis: Blood Pressure, Seated

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Unified Parkinson's Disease Rating Scale - Blood pressure: Standing.
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: UPDRS - Symptomatic Orthostasis: Blood Pressure, Standing

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Unified Parkinson's Disease Rating Scale - Blood pressure: Supine.
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: UPDRS - Symptomatic Orthostasis: Blood Pressure, Supine

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Unified Parkinson's Disease Rating Scale - Complications of therapy (in the past week): Other complications, Does the patient have anorexia, nausea, or vomiting?
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: UPDRS - Complications of Therapy: Other Complications - Anorexia, Nausea, or Vomiting

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Unified Parkinson's Disease Rating Scale - Complications of therapy (in the past week): Dyskinesias, Disability: How disabling are the dyskinesias? (Historical information; may be modified by office examination.).
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: UPDRS - Complications of Therapy: Dyskinesias - Disability

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Unified Parkinson's Disease Rating Scale - Complications of therapy (in the past week): Dyskinesias, Duration: What proportion of the waking day are dyskinesias present? (Historical information.).
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: UPDRS - Complications of Therapy: Dyskinesias - Duration

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Unified Parkinson's Disease Rating Scale - Complications of therapy (in the past week): Dyskinesias, Presence of early morning dystonia (Historical information.).
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: UPDRS - Complications of Therapy: Dyskinesias - Presence of Early Morning Dystonia

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Unified Parkinson's Disease Rating Scale - Complications of therapy (in the past week): Dyskinesias, Painful dyskinesias: How painful are the dyskinesias?
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: UPDRS - Complications of Therapy: Dyskinesias - Painful Dyskinesias

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Unified Parkinson's Disease Rating Scale - Complications of therapy (in the past week): Clinical fluctuations, What proportion of the waking day is the patient 'off' on average?
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: UPDRS - Complications of Therapy: Clinical Fluctuations - Average Off Periods Per Day

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Unified Parkinson's Disease Rating Scale - Complications of therapy (in the past week): Clinical fluctuations, Are 'off' periods predictable?
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: UPDRS - Complications of Therapy: Clinical Fluctuations - Off Periods Predictable

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Unified Parkinson's Disease Rating Scale - Complications of therapy (in the past week): Clinical fluctuations, Do 'off' periods come on suddenly, within a few seconds?
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: UPDRS - Complications of Therapy: Clinical Fluctuations - Off Periods Sudden

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Unified Parkinson's Disease Rating Scale - Complications of therapy (in the past week): Clinical fluctuations, Are 'off' periods unpredictable?
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: UPDRS - Complications of Therapy: Clinical Fluctuations - Off Periods Unpredictable

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Unified Parkinson's Disease Rating Scale - Complications of therapy (in the past week): Other complications, Any sleep disturbances, such as insomnia or hypersomnolence?
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: UPDRS - Complications of Therapy: Other Complications - Sleep Disturbances

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Unified Parkinson's Disease Rating Scale - Complications of therapy (in the past week): Other complications, Does the patient have symptomatic orthostasis? (Record the patient's blood pressure, height and weight on the scoring form).
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: UPDRS - Complications of Therapy: Other Complications - Symptomatic Orthostasis
